com.manaldush.telnet

Interface IController<E extends java.lang.Cloneable>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImplController

    public interface IController<E extends java.lang.Cloneable>
    Describe interface of object, that control telnet module. E object is implementation of interface clonable and describe configuration of controller. Created by Maxim.Melnikov on 20.06.2017.
